alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 7:10AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect... * The boundary between a building ridge and SPCZ is currently over the territory. Strong pressure gradients between these features will produce windy conditions through tonight... * TIMING...through tonight. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. Downed shallow-root trees and phone lines are possible. Shifting of loose and unsecured objects are also possible. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 706 TAEAO ASO TOFI IANUARI 27 2022 ...Ua iai nei le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O loo faatupulaia se vaega o peau mamafa o le ea i matu i sasa`e a o gasolo mai uiga louloua o le tau. O nei tulaga o le tau ua mafua ai ona malolosi savili i luga o le atunu`u. * TAIMI...e oo i le po nanei * AAFIAGA...E pau`u laau, lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e oo atu i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o le a aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
